about_the_game:
Freezer Pops Guide is a spoiler document with all choices you need to make to unlock all CGs as well as get ALL the endings. It's the easiest way for you to unlock the whole content of the game (including Steam Achievements). Do you want to end the game with Anderson or Fernando as your boyfriend?!

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about Freezer Pops.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Freezer Pops\Freezer Pops Guide.pdf

name: Freezer Pops - Guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Do you want to make all the right choices to unlock all CGs available in the game as well as get ALL the endings? Get a PDF document FULL OF SPOILERS about Freezer Pops right now and unlock all achievements!
